title: _NDIS_PCI_DEVICE_CUSTOM_PROPERTIES (ntddndis.h)
description: The NDIS_PCI_DEVICE_CUSTOM_PROPERTIES structure defines the type and speed of the PCI bus that a NIC is running on.
